alert.note: Alert for Duval (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Duval County through 500 AM CDT... At 430 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Freer, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Freer. This includes US Highway 59 between mile markers 766 and 772. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
